name: Attack! on Garkon 12
description:
You are Marco Zerk, stranded space janitor turned galactic hero! Armed with the experimental gamma gun and plasma grenades, blast your way the nightmare world of Garkon 12.

A twin-stick shooter inspired by Robotron: 2084, Geometry Wars, and countless arcade shooters, the demo contains a loop of 20 stages. Play with mouse and keyboard or a Windows supported controller. Game on, gamer!

Credits

Sprites - PMLOMB 1BIT 8X8SET

Sounds - Retro Sound Collection

Made with Nez and BulletML
